Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.ZombieActor
game.Zombie
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, ActorInterface, ZombieWorld
public class Zombie
extends ZombieActor
A Zombie. This Zombie is pretty boring. It needs to be made more interesting.
Author:
ram

    • getWeapon

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon getWeapon()

      Overrides:
      getWeapon in class ZombieActor
      Returns:
      null if and only if it misses the target, otherwise its Weapon.

    • getIntrinsicWeapon

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()

      Returns:

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
      If a zombie can attack, it will. If not, it will chase any human within 10 spaces. If no humans are close enough it will wander randomly. A zombie is also able to say a "zombie-like" phrase.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed

    • knockOffLimb

      public java.lang.String knockOffLimb​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      Knocks off a zombie's limbs.

      Knocks off at least one Limb from the zombie and drops it at the zombie's current or adjacent location.

      Use this method to knock off at least one limb from the zombie.

      Parameters:
      map - the map where the current Actor is.
      Returns:
      a description of the number of limbs being knocked off.
